page.title: 19TRANSPORT/ECONOMICS STURTON
page.content: {TRANSPORT PEOPLE PRIMARILY USE THEIR{OWN CARS}AS THERE IS ONLY A NOMINAL BUS SERVICE WITH{8 LINCOLNSHIRE ROAD CAR BUSES TRAVELLING DAILY{TO}AND{FROM LINCOLN {AND GAINSBOROUGH.}A{PRIVATELY OWNED {BUS}MAKES SEVERAL WEEKLY TRIPS TO BOTH TOWNS AND A{LOCAL SUPERMARKET}RUNS A {WEEKLY BUS}TO ITS STORE. THE AVERAGE COST OF RUNNING A PRIVATE CAR IS ESTIMATED AT{Â£21 PER WEEK. { {ECONOMICS THE{LOCAL SHOPS}ARE AUGMENTED BY A {TRAVELLING SHOP.}THE{POST OFFICE}HAS A {GIROBANK}AND THE{MIDLAND BANK}PROVIDES A{TWICE WEEKLY MOBILE SERVICE. CREDIT {CARDS,}AVAILABLE FROM SEVERAL BANKS, FOR USE IN PLACE OF CASH AND GIVING EXTENDED REPAYMENT FACILITIES,ARE NOW BECOMING INCREASINGLY POPULAR.
